pageTitle: TfL travel advice over the festive season

title.title: TfL travel advice over the festive season

texts: Transport for London (TfL) today set out this year's travel arrangements over the festive season.
Londoners and visitors to the Capital should plan their journeys carefully before travelling, as some services will be limited.
All TfL services will be free from 2345 on New Year's Eve until 0430 on New Year's Day, thanks to sponsorship by Natwest.
The entire Jubilee line will be closed from 25 - 30 December to allow the conversion to 7-car trains.
Services from Christmas Eve to New Year's Eve are:

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["\u003cstrong\u003eTube\u003c/strong\u003e A Saturday service will operate with reduced services in operation after 1900 and the last train will finish at Sunday times.","\u003cstrong\u003eBuses\u003c/strong\u003e \u003cbr /\u003eBuses will run a Saturday service but there will be no Night buses. On 24-hour routes, buses will operate until just after midnight.","\u003cstrong\u003eDocklands Light Railway\u003c/strong\u003e \u003cbr /\u003eA revised Saturday service will operate, finishing one hour earlier than the normal close of service.","\u003cstrong\u003eTramlink\u003c/strong\u003e A normal Saturday service will operate.","\u003cstrong\u003eNational Rail\u003c/strong\u003e \u003cbr /\u003eMany operators will reduce services from early evening with last train services departing by 2200. For further details please call National Rail services on 08457 48 49 50 before travelling.","\u003cstrong\u003eLondon River Services\u003c/strong\u003e \u003cbr /\u003eNo services except: City Cruises (020 7740 0400) and Thames Clippers (0870 781 5049)."]}

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["No service on any public transport networks except the Christmas Day Dinner Cruise operated by City Cruises. For further information call City Cruises - 020 7740 0400."]}

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["\u003cstrong\u003eTube\u003c/strong\u003e Special services will generally operate at 5-8 minute central area intervals between midday and 1900. First trains will run from about 0830, with last trains at normal Sunday times. At other times, 7-10 min interval services will generally operate.","\u003cstrong\u003eBuses\u003c/strong\u003e \u003cbr /\u003eA Sunday service will operate on all routes from about 0830 with the following exceptions: On routes 105,111,140, 203, 285, 490, H25, H26 and U3, a Sunday service will operate from about 05.30, in order to serve Heathrow Airport. Route 84 will only operate between New Barnet and Potters Bar stations. Route 477 will not operate.","\u003cstrong\u003eDocklands Light Railway\u003c/strong\u003e A special enhanced Boxing Day service will operate on all routes due to the closure of the Jubilee Line.","\u003cstrong\u003eTramlink\u003c/strong\u003e \u003cbr /\u003eA Sunday service will operate, but starting later than usual. Please check your local travel information for further details.","\u003cstrong\u003eNational Rail\u003c/strong\u003e \u003cbr /\u003eLimited services are expected to run. For further details please call National Rail services on 08457 48 49 50 before travelling.","\u003cstrong\u003eLondon River Services\u003c/strong\u003e \u003cbr /\u003eNo services except: City Cruises (020 7740 0400) Westminster Waterloo - Tower - Greenwich: normal service."]}

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["\u003cstrong\u003eTube\u003c/strong\u003e \u003cbr /\u003eNormal Saturday services will run on all lines except the Bakerloo Line, Central Line, Circle and Hammersmith \u0026 City Lines, Jubilee Line, Piccadilly Line and Waterloo \u0026 City Line. Please check with your local travel information centre for further details.","\u003cstrong\u003eBuses\u003c/strong\u003e \u003cbr /\u003eA Sunday service except on route 477, which will operate to a public holiday schedule and a normal service for the Night bus route.","\u003cstrong\u003eDocklands Light Railway\u003c/strong\u003e Due to the closure of the Jubilee Line, a standard Saturday service will operate - check with your local travel information for further details.","\u003cstrong\u003eTramlink\u003c/strong\u003e \u003cbr /\u003eA Saturday service will operate. Please check your local information centre for more details.","\u003cstrong\u003eNational Rail\u003c/strong\u003e \u003cbr /\u003eServices will run to modified timetables. Heathrow Express: Full Monday to Friday service. Gatwick Express: Normal weekday service will operate. Start of service: trains will be 0330 departure from London Victoria and 0435 departure from Gatwick Airport. Unfortunately, there will be no bus service between Tottenham Hale and Stansted Airport. All passengers are advised to travel to/from London Liverpool Street.","\u003cstrong\u003eLondon River Services\u003c/strong\u003e \u003cbr /\u003eNo services except: Catamaran Cruisers (020 7987 1185), City Cruises (020 7740 0400), Thames Clipper (0870 781 5049), Thames River Services (020 7930 4097)."]}

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["\u003cstrong\u003eTube\u003c/strong\u003e \u003cbr /\u003eSaturday services will run on all lines except the following which will be undergoing refurbishment work: the Central Line, Circle and Hammersmith \u0026 City Lines, Jubilee Line, Metropolitan Line, Piccadilly line. The Waterloo \u0026 City Line will operate a special service with trains every 6 minutes at peak times, 10 minutes off-peak. First and last trains will run at normal weekday times.","\u003cstrong\u003eBuses\u003c/strong\u003e \u003cbr /\u003eA Saturday service will operate with a few exceptions. Please check your local travel information for further details.","\u003cstrong\u003eDocklands Light Railway\u003c/strong\u003e Due to the closure of the Jubilee Line, a standard Monday to Friday service will operate.","\u003cstrong\u003eTramlink\u003c/strong\u003e A Saturday service will operate.","\u003cstrong\u003eNational Rail\u003c/strong\u003e Services will run to modified timetables. For further details please call National Rail services on 08457 48 49 50 before travelling.","\u003cstrong\u003eLondon River Services\u003c/strong\u003e No services except:Catamaran Cruisers (020 7987 1185), City Cruises (020 7740 0400), Thames Clipper (0870 781 5049) and Thames River Services (020 7930 4097)"]}

For 24-hour information on public transport in London, please call: 020 7222 1234.

TfL's Realtime pages display live travel information on London's public transport network: www.tfl.gov.uk/realtime
Journey Planner checks the transport network's status before providing results. The best available route is shown automatically: www.tfl.gov.uk/journeyplanner
Travel alerts via SMS and email can be set up at: www.tfl.gov.uk/alerts

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["All Christmas and New Year's travel arrangement information is available on the \u003ca href=\"http://www.tfl.gov.uk/realtime\"\u003eTfL website\u003c/a\u003e and in a special TfL Festive Travel leaflet available at Tube stations, Travel Information Centres and usual TfL outlets, or call London Travel Information on 020 7222 1234."]}
